ai-tha-ap351:0.3_0: He enjoyed the fruit of his good-hearted qualities, with the most senior monks.
ai-tha-ap351:1.4_0: the undefiled ones who have crossed the flood.
ai-tha-ap351:2.1_0: Having seen the fruit of a tree,
ai-tha-ap351:3.2_0: whatever fruit he enjoyed the fruit,
ai-tha-ap351:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap351:3.4_0: and the fruit of good and results.
ai-tha-ap351:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap351:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bakkula.
ai-tha-ap351:6.1_0: except the ninth fruit of the senior monks.
